title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: It's peyin dividends now but, fuckin suren it is, eh goes doon oan a huge line. — Ah've goat a young burd, wir oot at Wester Hailes, but wir gittin a flat in Lorne Street. Fuck steyin oot thair.

title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ah turns off intae Lorne Street, n gits up tae Begbie's stair n raps the door. Ah kin hear noises at the other side, like somebody's just ready tae leave.

title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: The other cop butts in. — Ms Taylor claims that you approached her in Leith Walk, shouted at her and pursued her down Lorne Street.

title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — We're here about an incident in Lorne Street earlier this week. Ah'm thinkin: Chizzie wisnae near Lorne Street …

title: Porno
